column2: "Na Job buaa dɛ
column5: Na wɔdze nsɛm ebubu me pasaa araa ma ekodu dabɛn?"

column2: "Mpɛn ara du nye yi na hom asopa me: Aso hom enyi nnto dɛ hom nye me dzi no wenwen dɛm?"
"Na sɛ ampaara mpo dɛ mafom a
column3: Mo mfom da mara mo do."

column2: "Sɛ ampa dɛ hom bɛmema homho do etsia me
column3: Na hom eyi me m'enyimguase ho atsɛn a:"

column2: "Ɔno dze hom nhu dɛ Nyankopɔn ebutuw no ama me
column3: Na ɔdze no boa etwa moho ehyia."

column2: "Hwɛ
column3: metsea mu dɛ
column5: naaso wɔnngye me do: Musu mefrɛ mboa

column2: "Nyankopɔn esi mo kwan do ban ma munntum munntwa mu
column3: Na ɔama sum ahyehyɛ m'atsempɔn do."

column2: "Ɔno na ɔapa m'enyimnyam efi mo ho
column3: Na oeyi me tsir abɔtsir."

column2: "Ɔno na oebubu m'afa nyina
column3: na minnyi hɔ: Na oetu m'enyidado dɛ dua."

column2: "Ɔno na eso ɔama n'ebufuw dzɛw wɔ mo do
column3: Na obu me dɛ n'atamfo no mu bi."

column2: "No dɔm horow bɔɔ mu bae
column3: na wɔbɔɔ hɔn kwan baa mo do
column4: Na wɔkyeer nsera bɔɔ m'asesee ho aprɔw."

column2: "Ɔno na oeyi mo nuanom efi mo ho akɔ ekyirekyir
column3: Na m'amanyimfo adandan me ananaben koraa."

column2: "M'ebusuafo apow me
column3: Na m'anyɛnko berɛbo werɛ efir me."

column2: "Hɔn a wɔtsetse me fi mu
column3: na me mbaawa mpo bu me ɔhɔho: Meyɛ nanaben wɔ hɔn enyi do."

column2: "Mefrɛ m'akowaa
column3: na ɔnngye me do
column4: Kaansa medze m'ano mepa no kyɛw mpo a."

column2: "M'ahomgu mpo adan atantandze ama me yer
column3: Na moho afon me na yamu mba."

column2: "Mbofraba nkakraba mpo bu me enyimtsia; Na sɛ mosoɛr a
column3: wɔkasa tsiatsia me."

column2: "Me mbanyin apamfo nyinara kyir me kɔkɔɔkɔ: Na hɔn a modɔ hɔn adan hɔnho etsia me."
"Me biew afam mo wer na mo honam ho
column3: Na aka ketseketse ma nkyɛ mahwer mo nkwa."

column2: "Ao hom me mfɛfo
column3: hom nhu me mbɔbɔr
column4: hom nhu me mbɔbɔr ae; Na Nyankopɔn ne nsa na aka me."

column2: "Ɔyɛ dɛn ntsi na hom tsiw me dɛ Nyankopɔn
column3: Na mo honam ara mmee hom yi?"

column2: "Ao kɛtseankyɛ afei wɔaakyerɛw me nsɛm! Ao ankyɛ wɔdze aahyɛ nwoma mu!"
"Dɛ nkyɛ wɔdze dadze kyerɛwdze na sumbui Eekrukye no wɔ botan mu ato hɔ daa:"
"Na emi dze
column3: minyim dɛ mo pomfo tse ase
column5: ɔbɛba ebedzi m'asɛm ama me wɔ asaase yi do:"

column2: "Na mo wer asɛɛ dɛm ekyir no
column3: Mpo mifi mo honam mu mubohu Nyankopɔn."

column2: "Ɔno na mobɔhwɛ no ama moho
column3: Na m'enyiwa bohu
column4: na nnyɛ obi fofor a. Ao
column5: mbrɛ me nsɛbɛ si wosow wɔ mo mu a!"

column2: "Sɛ hom se dɛ
column3: Yebesi dɛn etsiw no
column4: Osiandɛ woehu asɛm no no ndwow wɔ mo mu a;"

column2: "Ɔno homara so
column3: hom nsuro afona no: Na ebufuhyew na ɔdze afona ne ntsea ba
column4: Ama hom eehu dɛ atsɛmbu bi wɔ hɔ."
